picked_headlines.summary: Zapier's CEO shares his AI stack for analyzing culture, evaluating candidates, sourcing talent & boosting hiring efficiency. CEO-led AI adoption.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Provides practical insights into AI adoption at the leadership level, demonstrating how AI can be integrated into various business functions to improve efficiency and decision-making. Relevant for both technical and management audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: Breaker tokens can sabotage LLM composition via tokenizer transplant. Attack is training-free, evades detection, and persists against fine-tuning.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Highlights a critical vulnerability in LLMs, demonstrating a novel attack vector that can compromise model integrity. This is highly relevant for AI researchers, security engineers, and anyone involved in deploying or using LLMs.

digest:
*TabiBERT*: A large-scale Turkish language model achieves state-of-the-art results on TabiBench, demonstrating strong cross-domain generalization.  https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.23065

*PatchBlock*: A lightweight defense mechanism against adversarial patches for EdgeAI devices, improving robustness efficiently. https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00367

*Yahtzee as RL benchmark*: Reinforcement learning techniques applied to Yahtzee show promise, with A2C agents nearing optimal scores, but challenges remain in long-horizon credit assignment. https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00007

*AnyMS*: A training-free framework for multi-subject customization using layout guidance, achieving state-of-the-art performance by decoupling attention mechanisms. https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.23537

*DepFlow*: Mitigates semantic bias in depression detection by disentangling speech generation, improving model robustness. https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00303

*Open AI artifacts*: New models from NVIDIA, Arcee, Z.ai, and others highlight advancements in the open ecosystem. https://www.interconnects.ai/p/latest-open-artifacts-17-nvidia-arcee

*StockBot 2.0*: Vanilla LSTMs outperform Transformers for stock price prediction, showcasing better accuracy and stability with default hyperparameters. https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00197

*Semantic methods*: Enhance team sports tactics by modeling tactical configurations as semantic structures, with a Python prototype generating adaptive strategies. https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00421

*UltraGS*: Real-time ultrasound novel view synthesis using Gaussian Splatting with physics-inspired acoustic modeling, achieving state-of-the-art results. https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07743

*AI kernels*: Decentralized training scales rapidly, LLMs fine-tune each other, and AI converges on universal representations. https://jack-clark.net/2026/01/05/import-ai-439-ai-kernels-decentralized-training-and-universal-representations/

*Real-world AI agents*: Break due to memory drift, unreliable tools, evaluation difficulties, cost/latency limits, and eroded user trust, emphasizing the importance of system design. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46497654

*MCPs*: Extend beyond IDEs, integrating AI into workflows across platforms like Slack, GitHub, and Chrome, streamlining tasks and boosting productivity. https://www.oreilly.com/radar/mcps-for-developers-who-think-they-dont-need-mcps/
